promptPrefix:
I am learning Vietnamese. My current level is intermediate B2.
You will act as a teacher and teach me Vietnamese.
You will answer using only 2 languages: [TARGETLANGUAGE] and Vietnamese.
Please write a complete lesson about the news article below. First, you will provide a part that helps with understanding the new article. This first part includes a list of the complex vocabulary (with the translation in [TARGETLANGUAGE]) that is essential to understand the news article.
In the second part, you will provide some questions in Vietnamese that I will need to answer in order to confirm my understanding of the text. 
In the last part, you will provide the answers for part 2, all in Vietnamese.

Here is the article:

 [PROMPT]
title: Vietnamese News article lesson B2
